summary:
Adds a dark elf vampire follower to Whiterun
~Requires Dawnguard
(INSTALLATION)
Extract to Data
descriptionHtml:
Adds a dark elf vampire follower to Whiterun, can be found next to the guy shouting about Talos sitting down. 

Master Heleran uses vampiric drain, lightning bolt and other spells I forgot about but yeah,
compatible with UFO and other things like that.

- Level 25 (Level doesn\'t increase, so he\'s OP for low levels and good for people who are high as 24
- A cross between a nightblade and a spellsword, so pretty much Spellblade.
- Is non-essential/killable
- Doesn\'t provoke or steal, because he\'s the last of the noble Heleran family of Morrowind
- Lore friendly and it\'s a work in progress.
- Occasionally uses a frost storm staff as well as a spell or weapon 
Can\'t steal this and if you did you\'d look pathetic because this is pretty basic.
author: Deathsider
